original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bee d'urya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bee d'urya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed One, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened Buddha King of the Medicine King of Lapis Lazuli Light.
